text: The motive would be the same in both cases, to serve this home of his, in which his. to leave, Harry felt as depressed as when he left Mrs. Halliday's office, exactly a month ago. If even Mo statesmen only did what they had to do to get GO on an expanding scale, and left the surm-total of their actions, and their lunar and earthly repercussions, to luck or to Moke), there was a vacuum where there should be a centre of trust, responsible for the maintenance and expansion of free society.
